mapper.select: SELECT BOOTH_NO, COM_NO, BOOTH_NAME, BOOTH_DETAIL, BOOTH_IMG_ON, BOOTH_IMG_FP, BOOTH_PRICE, BOOTH_SECTION, COM_NAME, COM_OWNER, COM_PHONE1, COM_ADDRESS, COM_LOGO_FP, COM_BRNUM, REPORTING_DATE, BOOTH_STATUS, REPORTING_DATE FROM BOOTH B JOIN COMPANY ON(USER_NO=COM_NO) WHERE BOOTH_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY BOOTH_NAME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOTH VALUES (SEQ_BTNO.NEXTVAL, #{comNo}, #{boothName}, #{boothDetail}, #{boothImgOn}, #{boothImgFp}, #{boothPrice}, #{boothSection}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT BOOTH_NO, BOOTH_NAME, BOOTH_DETAIL, BOOTH_IMG_ON, BOOTH_IMG_FP, BOOTH_PRICE, BOOTH_SECTION, BOOTH_STATUS, REPORTING_DATE FROM BOOTH WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo}

SELECT BOOTH_NO, REPORTING_DATE, COM_NAME, BOOTH_NAME, BOOTH_PRICE, BOOTH_STATUS, COM_NO, BOOTH_SECTION, BOOTH_IMG_FP FROM BOOTH JOIN COMPANY ON(USER_NO=COM_NO) WHERE BOOTH_STATUS='N' OR BOOTH_STATUS='P' OR BOOTH_STATUS='J'
